I'm enjoying it. The loot system, that is.

Remember all those posts where someone who was banned/punished pleaded that Riot include some sort of incentive for them to behave well? 

Yet every time Riot does that (Ranked Season rewards, Hextech crafting, etc), suddenly it's "horrible" and "garbage" that Riot provided an incentive to behave well.

Because it's always perceived as a punishment.
Like so very often, it comes down to the "entitlement-issue". The moment a feature like this is implemented (or even just announced *coughcoughmagmachamber*) people feel entitled to it.
That's why it's so damn difficult in games like this to actually reward people in a sense where they actually **feel** rewarded. Everyone starts feeling entitled to the reward, and those who don't receive the reward feel punished.

This isn't even a rant on how stupid people are... this is a rant on how stupid (all of) our brains are wired. Not blaming anyone.
